package.name: Math_Basex
package.summary: Simple class for converting base set of numbers with a customize character base set.

release.notes: The maximum number that can be used is different per platform. If your long (int4) integer is too short and your platform doesn't provide int8 (64-bit) integers, tru converting your number to a double. Doubles are also 8-bytes. This way you can use int8 integers.
